Phrasing (https://phrasing.app) - CTO - Europe (REMOTE)

We're looking to assemble a small but mighty team to topple giants. Together, we'll leverage AI, ML, and LLMs to build the world's most effective language learning solution. Our tech stack includes:

  • ClojureScript + Reagent frontend with an in house local-first sync engine

  • Elixir + Phoenix backend with a websocket API

  • Elixir + Nx + Axon + Bumblebee for ML exploration

  • Python + Hatchet for some background tasks

For more information visit https://phrasing.app/dream-team

  • Sidenote: We're still working on rolling out the production version, but we're on track to finish this month. You can expect a lot more information to appear on our blog starting this weekend, with a more public launch near the end of the month.
